Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.cognifide.slice.api.provider.ChildrenProvider
    See ModelProvider and one of its methods:
    • ModelProvider.getChildModels(Class, String)
    • ModelProvider.getChildModels(Class, Resource)
    • ModelProvider.getList(Class, java.util.Iterator)
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.cognifide.slice.util.InjectorNameUtil
    since 4.1. User InjectorsRepository instead
    com.cognifide.slice.core.internal.provider.SliceChildrenProvider
    See ModelProvider and one of its methods:
  • ModelProvider.getChildModels(Class, String)
  • ModelProvider.getChildModels(Class, Resource)
  • ModelProvider.getList(Class, java.util.Iterator)
    		•
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.cognifide.slice.api.provider.ChildrenProvider.getChildren(String)
    The method introduces a bad design in the code. If you are using this try replacing it by one of ModelProvider's methods. However, if you still need children of a resource, then use simply Resource.listChildren()
    com.cognifide.slice.api.provider.ChildrenProvider.getChildResources(String)
    The method introduces a bad design in the code. If you are using this try replacing it by one of ModelProvider's methods. However, if you still need children of a resource, then use simply Resource.listChildren()
    com.cognifide.slice.api.tag.SliceTagUtils.getFromCurrentPath(SlingHttpServletRequest, InjectorsRepository, ContextProvider, Class)
    Use #getFromCurrentPath(SlingHttpServletRequest, InjectorsRepository, RequestContextProvider, Class)
    com.cognifide.slice.api.tag.SliceTagUtils.getFromCurrentPath(SlingHttpServletRequest, InjectorsRepository, ContextProvider, Class, String)
    Use #getFromCurrentPath(SlingHttpServletRequest, InjectorsRepository, RequestContextProvider, Class, String)
    com.cognifide.slice.util.InjectorNameUtil.getFromRequest(SlingHttpServletRequest)
    use InjectorsRepository.getInjectorNameForResource(String) instead
    com.cognifide.slice.util.InjectorNameUtil.getFromResourceType(String)
    use InjectorsRepository.getInjectorNameForResource(String) instead
    com.cognifide.slice.api.context.ContextFactory.getServletRequestContext(ServletRequest, ServletResponse)
    Use method with explicit injector name ContextFactory#getServletRequestContext(String, ServletRequest, ServletResponse)
    com.cognifide.slice.core.internal.context.SliceContextFactory.getServletRequestContext(ServletRequest, ServletResponse)
    Use method with explicit injector name ContextFactory#getServletRequestContext(String, ServletRequest, ServletResponse)
